name: Double Cheeseburger
author: Rudy Torrijos III
summary: Great recipe for a double cheeseburger.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon thousand island salad dressing (such as Kraft®)
directions: Preheat a skillet over medium heat
Lightly toast both halves of the hamburger bun, cut sides down, 2 to 3 minutes
Separate beef into 2 portions and form each into a thin patty slightly larger than the bun
Lightly salt each patty and cook on one side for 2 to 3 minutes
Flip patties over and immediately place two slices of American cheese on each one
Cook until meat has reached desired doneness, 2 to 3 minutes more
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 160 degrees F (70 degrees C)
Assemble the double cheeseburger in the following order: bottom bun, dressing, tomato, lettuce, beef patty with cheese, onion, beef patty with cheese,  and top bun
